content: the patterns for this project will be free to download in 8 fortnightly pdf patterns from the stylecraft website between the end of april and july 2020 patterns are written in uk and us terms and dutch language the patterns will include step-by-step images throughout yarn requirements colour recipe 1 parchment & caramel stylecraft life dk 100g 298m/326yds 25% wool 75% premium acrylic parchment 2445 4 balls caramel 2446 3 balls blue haze 2346 1 ball cranberry 2319 1 ball denim 2322 1 ball fern 2311 1 ball rose 2301 1 ball stylecraft batik dk 50g 138m/151yds 20% wool 80% premium acrylic coral 1903 1 ball graphite 1915 1 ball heather 1906 1 ball mint 1918 1 ball rose 1916 1 ball finished size 128cm 50 1/2 in square colour recipe 2 night & dusk stylecraft naturals - bamboo + cotton 100g 250m/273yds 60% bamboo 40% cotton night 7160 4 balls dusk 7159 3 balls canyon 7157 1 ball celery 7155 1 ball peach 7131 1 ball pumice 7154 1 ball raisin 7158 1 ball rose 7165 1 ball seafoam 7143 1 ball thyme 7156 1 ball umber 7161 1 ball finished size 112cm 44in square
